root.name: RPG Maker VX
root.description: Developed by Enterbrain and the successor to RPG Maker XP.ReceptionThe response to the game has generally been mixed. It has gotten positive feedback due it being easier to use than previous RPG-making programs. On the other hand, the battle system has been criticized for abandoning battle backgrounds which were featured in RPG maker XP, and the fact that most action is text-based.
